name: The Hero Has Died
description:
Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move left and right

Spacebar: Jump

Hold Shift or Left Click: Enter Ghost Mode (makes you intangible)

The Hero has died once again and it is up to you to collect the pieces of his soul to revive him. This is a short platformer with a small little gimmick, I hope you enjoy!

Also I don't know why his jump animation is so phallic send help
